1.「おおっ！| そこにおるのは <pc>じゃな！| おぬしを ずっと待っていたんじ: Oh! There you are, <pc>! I've been|waiting for you for a long time.

2.「いつぞやは 乾いていたワシを 助けてくれて| たいへん 感謝しておる。| おか: I am very grateful to you for helping me out|of the doldrums the other day. Thanks to you,|I have returned home safely.

4.「ワシが アラハギーロの王だと 主張しても| 誰も 信じてくれんのじゃよ。| 兵: No one believes me when I claim to be the king|of Araguaguiro. Soldiers and even ministers|are treated as monsters...

5.「こんな姿では しょうがないことと| わかってはおるんじゃが……| ワシ くやし: I know it's no use to look like this, but... I|feel so bad and pathetic!

6.「そこでじゃ！ おぬしに頼みたいことがある。: So here it is! I have a favor to ask of you.

While wandering through the parched southern|desert, a demon named <%SEV_QUE_NAME0>|inadvertently stole his precious king's|
|scepter.

8.「王家の紋章が 入っておって| アラハギーロの王に 代々 受け継がれる| 黄金の: It is a golden scepter with the royal coat of|arms, passed down from generation to|generation to the king of Araghaghiro.

9.「それを <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>から| 取り戻してきてたもれ！| どう: Get it back from <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>! What do you|think? Will you do it?

10.「おおっ。ありがたや！| さすがは ワシの命の恩人じゃ。| では よろしく頼んだ: Oh. Thank you! You are indeed the man who|saved my life. I'll be looking forward to|working with you.

11.「アラハギーロ王の証である 王しゃくさえあれば| ワシが この国の王であると 証:
As long as I have the king's scepter, the|proof of the king of Alahagiro, I can prove|that I am the king of this country and I can|
|get out of here.

12.「おお。ありがたや……と 言いたいところじゃが| おぬし 他の者からの頼まれごと: Oh, thank you. I would say thank you, but you|seem to have your hands full with other|people's requests.

13.「それらを 速やかに片付けて| 急いで 戻ってまいるのじゃ。| ワシ ここで待っ: Clean them up quickly and hurry back. I will|be waiting for you here.

14.「そ…そんな！ おぬしなら 引き受けてくれると| 思っておったのに……。: Oh, no! I thought you would take care of it...

15.「気が変わったら 戻ってきてほしいのう。| おぬししか ワシの頼みを| 聞いてく: If you change your mind, please come back. You|are the only one who will do me the favor...

16.「そこにおるのは <pc>じゃな！| また 来てくれると 信じておったぞ。: There you are, <pc>! I knew you|would come back.

18.「干からびかけて 砂漠の南部をさまよっていた時| <%sEV_QUE_NAME0:
While wandering through the parched southern|desert, a demon named <%SEV_QUE_NAME0>|inadvertently stole his precious king's|
|scepter.

It bears the royal coat of arms... a golden|scepter that has been passed down from|generation to generation of the kings of|
|Araguaguiro.

20.「それを <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>から| 取り戻してきてたもれ！| どう: Get it back from <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>! What do you|think? Will you do it?

21.「アラハギーロ王の証である 王しゃくさえあれば| ワシが この国の王であると 証:
As long as I have the king's scepter, the|proof of the king of Alahagiro, I can prove|that I am the king of this country and I can|
|get out of here.

22.「ワシから 王しゃくを盗んだ| <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>は| アラハギー: The <%sEV_QUE_NAME0> who stole the royal|scepter from me must be in the southern part|of the Alahaghiro region!

23.「その <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>を倒して| ワシの王しゃくを 取り戻して: Go defeat that <%sEV_QUE_NAME0> and get your|eagle's scepter back!

24.「ワシ ここで待っておるからの。| 頼んだぞ <pc>！: I'll be waiting for you here. I'll be waiting|here for you <pc>!

25.「はわっ <pc>！| ……その顔は もしや ワシの王しゃくを| 取り戻してきて: Wow <pc>! ...I see by your face|that you have recovered my royal scepter.

26.「では…… さっそく| ワシの王しゃくを 渡してくれるかのう？<yesno><c: Now... will you hand me my eagle's king's|shaku right away?<yesno><close>

27.<pc>は わかめ王子に|黄金の王しゃくを 渡した。: <pc> gave the golden king's|scepter to Prince Wakame.

28.「おお！ これをふたたび| 手にすることができようとは……感無量じゃ。| これさ: Oh! To have this in my hands again...I'm so|excited. I just need this to get me out of|here!

29.「うるさいぞ！ おとなしくしていろ！: Shut up! Shut the fuck up!

30.「おお！ ちょうどよい。| 見張りの兵士よ。カブースと アブタルを| 急ぎ ここ: Oh! Just in time. Soldiers on guard. Get|Caboose and Abutar here as soon as possible.

31.「貴様！ 魔物の分際で 何をエラそうに。| 大臣と兵士長を 呼びつけようとは！: You! How dare you, you demon! You dare to|summon the Minister and the Chief of Soldiers!

32.「早く 呼んでまいれ！ 急ぐのじゃ！| さもないと ヌルヌルした ワシのわかめで: Call them quickly! Hurry up! Or I'll cover|your mouth with my slimy wakame!

34.「いったい なにごとだ！？: What on earth is going on?

35.「来たな ふたりとも。| これから ワシこそ アラハギーロの王じゃと| 証明して: You have arrived, both of you. From now on, I|will prove that I am the king of Araguajillo.

37.「我は 第７９代 国王ムーニス。| 千年の栄光に 彩られし| アラハギーロ王国の: I am Moonis, the 79th King. I am the 79th King|of the Kingdom of Araghaghiro, the glorious|Kingdom of a thousand years!

38.「今までの非礼は 大目に見よう。| さっ 早く ここから 出すのじゃ。: I will tolerate no disrespect from you. Now|get us out of here.

39.「貴様…… どこで| その王しゃくを 手に入れた！？: You....where did you get that king's scepter!

40.「おおかた ムーニス王から盗み取ったのだろう。| いやしい魔物め……。| ふぬぅ: He probably stole it from King Moonis. That|nasty demon... Hmmm. I'm finally worried about|the king's safety.

41.「な なんじゃと……。| これでも 信じぬというのか。| なんという 恩知らずど: What is it... you don't believe me even after|all this? How ungrateful they are!

42.「ええい アブタル！ おぬしがちょくちょく| 調理室のチーズを 盗み食いしている: Hey, Abtal! I've been doing this without|telling you that you've been stealing and|eating cheese from the kitchen!

43.「な！ なぜ そのことを知っている！: I know that! How did you know about that!

44.「カブース！ 昔 ポエム入りの| 寒いラブレターを 侍女に 書いておったこと|: Caboose! You don't mind if I tell the castle|that you used to write cold love letters with|poems to your lady-in-waiting?

46.「いや し…しかし そのことは| 私と王だけしか 知らぬはず……。: No... but only the king and I know that...

47.「まさか 本当に ムーニス王……なのですか？: Are you sure you are King Moonis?

48.「本当じゃ！ まだ 信じられぬようなら| おぬしの こっぱずかしい過去を| もっ: It's true! If you still don't believe me, you|can tell me more and more about your dubious|past.

50.「わかったなら さっさと| ワシを ここから出すのじゃ！| ただちに じゃ！: All right, then get me the hell out of here!|Now!

52.「ふう。<pc>。| おぬしのおかげで ワシが ムーニスじゃと| ようやく 信じ: Fu. <pc>. Thanks to you, they|finally believe that I am Moonis.

53.「おぬしには 礼をせねばな。| この後 玉座の間まで| 足を運んでもらえるかのう: I must thank you. Can you please come to the|throne room afterwards?

54.「では 待っておるぞ。: Then I will be waiting for you.

56.「命を助けられたばかりではなく| ワシが 王だと認めさせる| 手助けまで しても: Not only did he save my life, but he also|helped me to recognize that I am the king...

57.「おぬしには 本当に 世話になったのう。| これは 約束した礼じゃ！ 受け取って: I am truly indebted to you. This is for what I|promised! Take it!

58.「ムーニス王 今こそ お聞かせください。| 何が どうなって そのような お姿に: King Moonis, now is the time to ask. What|happened to you to make you look like that?

59.「カブース…… これから話すことを| 心して 聞いてほしい。| あの戦争で起こっ: Caboose...I want you to listen to what I am|about to tell you with all your heart. This is|the whole story of what happened in that war.

60.「あの魔族との戦争に ワシと| ゴリウス兵士長率いる アラハギーロ軍は| 必死の: In the war against the demons, the Araghaghiro|army led by Eagle and Gorius fought with|desperate determination.

61.「しかし 奮戦むなしく こてんぱんにされ| 魔族によって 捕らえられてしまったの: However, in vain, they were beaten to a pulp|and captured by the demon tribe. We were|prepared to die.

62.「ところが 魔族の将は ワシらを殺すことはせず| 皆を それぞれ 魔物の姿に変え: However, the general of the demon tribe didn't|kill us, but changed each of us into the form|of a demon.

63.「そして 魔物に変えられた兵士たちは| いずこかへ 連れ去られてしまった……。: And the soldiers who were turned into demons|were taken away...

64.「ただ ワシはこの通り わかめ王子の姿にされ| 砂漠の日差しにより 干からびてい:
However, as you can see, I was transformed|into a wakame (seaweed) prince and dried out|by the desert sun, so I was out of their sight|
|and saved.

65.「なんと むごいことを……。: What a terrible thing to do...

66.「そうじゃな。……しかし どこへ| なんの目的で 連れ去ったかは わからんが|: Yes, they are. But I don't know where they|took them or for what purpose, but I'm sure|they are all alive.

67.「ワシはこれから 国を挙げて 情報を集め| なんとか 行方不明の者たちを| 探し: I am going to gather information from all over|the country and try to find the missing|people.

68.「<pc>。おぬしにも また| 何か 協力を依頼することになるやもしれぬ。| そ: <pc>. I may ask for your help|again. If so, please do me a favor.

69.「おお <pc>。| わざわざ ワシのことを心配して| 会いに来てくれたのか？: Oh <pc>. Did you come all the way|here to see me because you're worried about|me?

70.「このような姿じゃから この玉座の間に| こもりっきりなんじゃが| オリの中より: I'm stuck in this throne room because I look|like this, but it's a lot better than being in|a cage.

71.「じゃが このままの姿だと 行方不明の者たちを| 探すにも 支障があるのう。|: But in my current state, it will not be easy|to find those who are missing. I must return|to human form as soon as possible...

72.「<pc>。近いうち| ふたたび 協力を頼むことになるやもしれぬ。| そのときは: <pc>. I may ask for your help|again soon. I look forward to working with you|again in the near future.

73.「ぬっ！？ 何を申すか おぬし。| それは 正真正銘 ワシのものじゃ！| この手: What are you talking about? What are you|talking about? It is mine! Put it in my hand|now!<yesno><close>
